content:
I am currently a senior undergraduate in pursuit of a B.Eng. degree in mechanical engineering with specialization in mechantronics.
‘Diversity is essential to happiness’ by Philosopher Bertrand Russell is my life motto. Thus, I devoted myself to realizing intelligent sensing & control in both industrial projects and academic researches during my bachelor studies.
From Aug 2018, I have started my academic exploration as an apprentice researcher in Vision4Robotics Group, Tongji University, supervised by Prof. Changhong Fu. I have strong interest in vision for robotics, with a focus on the incorporation of the state-of-the-art machine learning techniques into vision perception & processing.
Currently, I am looking for a Ph.D position in the areas of robotics and computer vision. You can find my latest CV here.
 Due to the rebuilding of this personal website, more content is to be updated in following days !
summary:
I am currently a senior undergraduate in pursuit of a B.Eng. degree in mechanical engineering with specialization in mechantronics.
‘Diversity is essential to happiness’ by Philosopher Bertrand Russell is my life motto. Thus, I devoted myself to realizing intelligent sensing & control in both industrial projects and academic researches during my bachelor studies.
From Aug 2018, I have started my academic exploration as an apprentice researcher in Vision4Robotics Group, Tongji University, supervised by Prof.
title: Yujie He

content:
Flexibility This feature can be used for publishing content such as:
 Online courses Project or software documentation Tutorials  The courses folder may be renamed. For example, we can rename it to docs for software/project documentation or tutorials for creating an online course.
Delete tutorials To remove these pages, delete the courses folder and see below to delete the associated menu link.
Update site menu After renaming or deleting the courses folder, you may wish to update any [[main]] menu links to it by editing your menu configuration at config/_default/menus.toml.
For example, if you delete this folder, you can remove the following from your menu configuration:
[[main]] name = "Courses" url = "courses/" weight = 50  Or, if you are creating a software documentation site, you can rename the courses folder to docs and update the associated Courses menu configuration to:
[[main]] name = "Docs" url = "docs/" weight = 50  Update the docs menu If you use the docs layout, note that the name of the menu in the front matter should be in the form [menu.X] where X is the folder name. Hence, if you rename the courses/example/ folder, you should also rename the menu definitions in the front matter of files within courses/example/ from [menu.example] to [menu.<NewFolderName>].
summary: Learn how to use Academic's docs layout for publishing online courses, software documentation, and tutorials.
title: Overview

title: Example Page 2

content:
Teaching Assistant from Sep. 2018 - Jan. 2019
  Assisted first-year students major in Industrial Design to get started Arduino Hardware and Programming
 Designed a series of the electromechanical module to give three lessons on basic mechanical analysis and design and gave a lecture on advanced RGBD sensors including Microsoft Kinect and Intel Realsense for the semester project
  The following video is Mechatronics Module Experiments.
summary: Acted as TA for freshmen in [College of Design & Innovation](http://tjdi.tongji.edu.cn/)
title: Teaching Assistant in Open Source Hardware and Programming

content:
Powertrain Group Leader from Sep. 2016 - Dec. 2018
  Designed and optimized the overall powertrain system, including motor invertor, high-voltage accumulators, wheel-side planetary gearbox, and matching cooling system, to ensure China’s first leading four-wheel-drive Formula Student Racecar, with an 8% efficiency, 10% lightweight, and higher stability improvement Participated FSEC 2016 - 2018 and SFJ 2018 as a senior engineer, DIAN Racing won first place in Engineering Design and Efficiency Prize, and Best Powertrain Award for two consecutive years.  The following video is virtual assembly of DRe18，which was what I worked for as Powertrain Group Leader.

  Design Report Final @ FSEC19
summary: Built First leading 4WD Formula Student Racecar in China.
title: DIAN Racing Formula Student Electric Team

content:
Robotics Algorithm Development Intern from Jul. 2018 - Aug. 2018
  Implemented sensor fusion between Pandar40 (a 40-channel LiDAR) and gyroscope to achieve 5% accuracy improvements on top of state-of-the-art SLAM framework, LOAM, and drew a 3D point cloud map of Tongji University Jiading Campus below 10m Deployed control, decision, and communication algorithms for a self-developed skid steer wheel robot, realizing autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance in a $ 300 m^2 $ workspace  
 Indoor SLAM @ Hesai

 Debugging the robot

 Jiading Campus Satellite Map corresponding to the map generated from Pandar40
summary: Implemented Outdoor SLAM @ Tongji Jiading Campus and Indoor Autonomous Navigation .
title: SLAM and Autonomous Navigation for Skid Steer Wheel Robot

content:
Project Manager & Mechanical Development Leader from Oct. 2016 - Jun. 2018
  Designed two main robots to participate international shooting competition, RoboMaster, achieving stability of the chassis and 3DOF pan-tilt mechanism and constructing multi-robot interaction Optimized structural design to enhance operation stability and achieve lightweight, enabling the robots flexible operation and combating under complicated circumstances
summary: Designed robots to combat in RoboMaster.
title: Super Power Robot Team
